channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain near bus stop outside 191-193 Kilburn Lane, 1st February
item.description:
The drain has been constantly blocked for months. Every time it rains, a massive puddle forms and people at the bus stop are constantly getting wet from vehicles which need to move closer the kerb when traffic is passing on the other side of the wall. The constant puddle has started to cause the tarmac to crumble and potholes to appear. Please can the drain be cleared. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn Lane, North Kensington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tube lights dumped by Salmons Brook pathway, 1st February
item.description:
Household florescent tube lights have been dumped at the end of the walkway by the river someone has already smashed a tube light on the pathway walking towards Edmonton Green these are hazardous to the environment and need removing asap.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Salmons Walk, Edmonton, Greater London
